samples.question: And it, you know, if junk food can make people feel not very good, why do so many people eat it?
samples.transcript: Because it is it is convenient and there are like so many jung food there in like in many place.
samples.transcript_original: because it's it's convenient and there are like so many jung food there in like in many place.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Because it is it is convenient and there are like so many jung food there in like in many place.

samples.question: So yeah, and do you think maybe the government should perhaps regulate unhealthy food?
samples.transcript: I think yes because for the people that they are in rush or the children that did not think about the nutrition much. I think the government should like limit the sugar and how much sugar that contain in the food. So they can help the the people that I said to eat more like healthy food. Okay, thank you very much best. That is the end of the speaking test.

samples.question: Do you like following celebrities or popular people?
samples.transcript: >> yes. I mean sometimes I follow them. I do not follow too much but some famous people they inspire me so I like to know about them.
samples.transcript_original: >> Um, yes. I mean sometimes I follow them. I don't follow too much but some famous people they inspire me so I like to know about them.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> yes. I mean sometimes I follow them. I do not follow too much but some famous people they inspire me so I like to know about them.

samples.question: >> Who is a famous person you admire?
samples.transcript: >> there are many but but one person I admire most is is Virat Kohli.
samples.transcript_original: >> Uh there are many but but one person I admire most is is Virat Kohli.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> there are many but but one person I admire most is is Virat Kohli.

samples.question: >> Do famous people influence young people?
samples.transcript: >> Yes. I think so. Young people they copy like style, talking, lifestyle. So yes, they influence a lot. >> Thank you.
samples.transcript_original: >> Yes. Uh I think so. Young people they copy like style, talking, lifestyle. So yes, they influence a lot. >> Thank you.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> Yes. I think so. Young people they copy like style, talking, lifestyle. So yes, they influence a lot. >>

samples.question: Why do some people become famous very quickly nowadays?
samples.transcript: I think today it is very easy to become famous because because of social media. Even if a person does not have big talent, just one video like funny video or dance video can make them famous. People share things fast and millions watch. So fame becomes easy. I think technology makes fame quick.
samples.transcript_original: Um I think today it is very easy to become famous because um because of social media. Even if a person doesn't have big talent, just one video like funny video or dance video can make them famous. People share things fast and millions watch. So fame becomes easy. I think technology makes fame quick.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I think today it is very easy to become famous because because of social media. Even if a person does not have big talent, just one video like funny video or dance video can make them famous. People share things fast and millions watch. So fame becomes easy. I think technology makes fame quick.

samples.question: >> Do you think famous people have more responsibilities?
samples.transcript: >> Yes, I feel they have big responsibility because many people watch them, copy them and believe them. If they do something wrong, many young people also do same thing. So they should behave good and show good example like discipline, honesty.
samples.transcript_original: >> Yes, I feel they have big responsibility because many people watch them, copy them and believe them. If they do something wrong, many young people also do same thing. So they should behave good and show good example like discipline, honesty.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> Yes, I feel they have big responsibility because many people watch them, copy them and believe them. If they do something wrong, many young people also do same thing. So they should behave good and show good example like discipline, honesty.

samples.question: >> Is it good for children to admire celebrities?
samples.transcript: >> it can be good and also not good. If celebrity is positive, hardworking, then children learn good things. But if they follow celebrities for only looks or fashion then it is not good. Children should admire parents or teachers more not only celebrities.
samples.transcript_original: >> Um it can be good and also not good. If celebrity is positive, hardworking, then children learn good things. But if they follow celebrities for only looks or fashion then it is not good. Children should admire parents or teachers more not only celebrities.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> it can be good and also not good. If celebrity is positive, hardworking, then children learn good things. But if they follow celebrities for only looks or fashion then it is not good. Children should admire parents or teachers more not only celebrities.

samples.question: >> Can people become famous without any talent?
samples.transcript: >> Yes. Today many people become famous without real talent like influencers or people who make short videos. Sometimes they just do funny things or strange things and suddenly they become famous. But I think real talent stays long and quick fame does not stay long. >> Thank you Paul. That is the end of your speaking test. Thanks for watching this IELTS speaking.
samples.transcript_original: >> Yes. Today many people become famous without real talent like um influencers or people who make short videos. Sometimes they just do funny things or strange things and suddenly they become famous. But I think real talent stays long and quick fame doesn't stay long. >> Thank you Paul. That is the end of your speaking test. Thanks for watching this IELTS speaking.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> Yes. Today many people become famous without real talent like influencers or people who make short videos. Sometimes they just do funny things or strange things and suddenly they become famous. But I think real talent stays long and quick fame does not stay long. >> Thank you Paul. That is the end of your speaking test. Thanks for watching this IELTS speaking.
